name: customer
custom_sql:
SELECT cs.*, sum(li.quantity * li.unit_price) as lifetime_value FROM customers as cs
LEFT JOIN orders as od ON od.customer_id = cs.id
LEFT JOIN line_items as li ON od.id = li.order_id
GROUP BY cs.id

name: country
custom_sql: SELECT co.*, count(cs.id) as customers_count FROM countries as co\nJOIN customers as cs ON cs.country_code = co.code\nGROUP BY co.id
